job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Must Haves</strong></p><ul><li>6+ years of experience designing, building, deploying, testing, maintaining, monitoring and owning scalable, resilient and distributed machine learning systems and platforms.</li><li>Proficiency in operating machine learning solutions at scale, covering the end-to-end ML workflow.</li><li>Expertise with tools and platforms commonly used for end-to-end machine learning (Kubeflow, TFX, Airflow, MLflow, ...).</li><li>Knowledge of Feature Stores (e.g. Feast, Tecton).</li><li>Basic understanding of ML techniques and algorithms (supervised vs. unsupervised learning, deep learning, ...).</li><li>Familiarity with real-world ML systems (configuration, data collection, data verification, feature extraction, resource and process management, analytics, training, serving, validation, experimentation, monitoring).</li></ul>
